trans-unit.source: Implements <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDeferringLoader"></xref> in order to defer loading of the XAML content that is defined for a template in WPF XAML.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDeferringLoader"> </xref> for å utsette innlasting av XAML-innholdet som er definert for en mal i WPF XAML.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: ## XAML teksten Bruk

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.TemplateContentLoader"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.TemplateContentLoader"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Loads XAML content in a deferred mode, based on a <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlReader"></xref> and certain required services from a service provider.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn XAML-innholdet i utsatte modus, basert på en <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlReader"> </xref> og enkelte obligatoriske tjenester fra en tjenesteleverandør.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlObjectWriterFactory> is a required service, it must be available on the passed `serviceProvider`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlObjectWriterFactory>er en obligatorisk tjeneste, må den være tilgjengelig på den innsendte `serviceProvider`.</xref:System.Xaml.IXamlObjectWriterFactory>

trans-unit.source: The initiating reader that is then returned on calls to <xref:System.Windows.TemplateContentLoader.Save*>.
trans-unit.target: Den første leseren som deretter returneres på kall til <xref:System.Windows.TemplateContentLoader.Save*>.</xref:System.Windows.TemplateContentLoader.Save*>

trans-unit.source: Service provider for required services.
trans-unit.target: -Leverandør for obligatoriske tjenester.

trans-unit.source: The root object for the node stream of the input <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlReader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rotobjekt for node-dataflyten for inndataene <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlReader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, this is a <xref href="System.Windows.TemplateContent"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Nærmere bestemt dette er en <xref href="System.Windows.TemplateContent"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: xamlReader or serviceProvider are .
trans-unit.target: xamlReaderor serviceProvider are .

trans-unit.source: serviceProvider does not provide a required service.
trans-unit.target: serviceProviderinneholder ikke en obligatorisk tjeneste.

trans-unit.source: Do not use; always throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Ikke bruk; alltid oppstår det et unntak.

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: Se kommentarer.

trans-unit.source: The purpose of <xref:System.Windows.TemplateContentLoader> is to load the XAML and invoke an object factory metaphor, a `Save` path is not part of its intended design.
trans-unit.target: Formålet med <xref:System.Windows.TemplateContentLoader>er å laste inn XAML og aktivere en objektet fabrikken metafor, en `Save` banen er ikke en del av den tiltenkte utformingen.</xref:System.Windows.TemplateContentLoader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlObjectWriterFactory> passed as a service for <xref:System.Windows.TemplateContentLoader.Load%2A> provides support for all further operations involving XAML and the template.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlObjectWriterFactory>sendes som en tjeneste for <xref:System.Windows.TemplateContentLoader.Load%2A>gir støtte for alle flere operasjoner som omfatter XAML og malen.</xref:System.Windows.TemplateContentLoader.Load%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.IXamlObjectWriterFactory>

trans-unit.source: The input value to commit for deferred loading.
trans-unit.target: Inndataverdien til å utføre for utsatt innlasting.

trans-unit.source: Service provider for required services.
trans-unit.target: -Leverandør for obligatoriske tjenester.

trans-unit.source: Always throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Alltid oppstår det et unntak.

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: Se kommentarer.

trans-unit.source: Thrown in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Et i alle tilfellene.
